card.name: Lugia-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Aero Ball
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Deep Hurricane
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 70 more damage. Then, discard that Stadium card.
